name: Amoxicillin
description: A penicillin-type antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

name: Ibuprofen
description: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce pain, inflammation, and fever.

name: Paracetamol
description: A common painkiller used to treat aches and pain. It can also be used to reduce a high temperature.

name: Aspirin
description: An NSAID used to treat pain, fever, or inflammation.
